lead_paragraph: Current calls for war work volunteers are centering on the drive for 97,000 borough group leaders, according to Mrs. Walter Bunzl, chairman of recruitment for the Greater New York CDVO. Officials believe that once this block plan organization is set up it will expedite the systematic enlistment of volunteers for all pressing services.
abstract: Wage-Hr Law: Wash State and Calif lead in upward minimum wage revision
